archimate:Constraint.name: EHF
archimate:Constraint.documentation:
EHF (Elektronisk Handelsformat) er en norsk tilpasning til et felleseuropeisk fakturaformat. Organisasjonsnummeret til kunden er adressen.
The EHF and PEPPOL BIS standard are mandated for central, regional and local contracting authorities and entities. UBL is the technical format (syntax) that is widely used by trading parties in Norway. EHF - Electronic trade format â€“ is a national format based on PEPPOL BIS (and UBL) that is used in public procurement. The only difference is that two information fields are optional in PEPPOL BIS but mandatory in EHF.
